game.name: Little Cat Doctor
game.description:
Hey girls! Your dream of becoming a doctor can come true if you stay with us in this brand new hospital simulator. But you would not have to deal with human beings, but you will have to take care of an animal hospital. Are you ready to take this unique challenge, friends? Join Little Cat Doctor and be prepared to help little furry friends get the best treatment possible and make them feel happy and enjoy a healthy life again! Perform well and unlock new hospitals!

You are playing the role of a veterinarian in one of the top animal hospitals of the city. This is a small ambulance clinic so you have to do most of jobs on your own. Be careful and welcome the two types of kittens which come to your clinic today in this HTML5 doctor game! First kitten is suffering from a problem of cold. Start with taking her temperature and then put some ice pack on her forehead! Give her some cough syrup after unlocking their nostrils! Hope her fever goes away now in this hospital surgery game!

The second type of kitten is having splinters in her skin and some flees in her fur. Remove the splinters with the help of a pair of tweezers and then apply a spray for some flees in this medical simulator! Use an ointment to treat the remaining scars! Try to keep putting your best efforts until your ambulance clinic gets promoted to a new hospital in this cute kitten game! Keep taking bigger medical assignments and learning new types of treatments until you reach to the last one!
